Description: Lower body sherd of North Ionian pottery bowl; interior glazed black with added red band lined in white; exterior: wide black (fired streaky brown) area above, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 346)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 672, no. 307)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.253)
